name: Spectrum Redux
description: Includes a series of tweaks and modifications to improve the user experience of the RSI Spectrum site.
additional_info:
UPDATES

v0.1.1c - 12/2/2017
- Numerous minor tweaks
- Modified quote and blockquote styling, including the font

v0.1.1b - 6/9/2017
- Minor tweaks to accommodate 0.3.5

v0.1.1a - 6/8/2017
--------------------------
- Removed spacing for Star Citizen and Organization section links in upper left beneath user
- Redesigned styling to better accommodate nested threads, preventing tiny columns under deeply nested posts

v0.1.1 - 4/21/2017
--------------------------
- Increased padding for blockquotes and code segments
- Changed headlines from Orbitron to Roboto Sans & slightly increased size for the sake of legibility
- Updated post styling to accommodate nested (reddit style) posts for Spectrum v0.3.3g
